src:
Najmanje 54 osobe poginule u napadu džihadista u Maliju

02 Nov 2019, 11:15

Najmanje 54 osobe poginule su u napadu džihadista na vojsku na severu Malija, saopštila je danas tamošnja Vlada.Napad se dogodio juče kada je vojska objavila da je 15 osoba poginulo u regionu Menaka. Očekuje se da će ovaj napad povećati tenzije u tom regionu.Članovi porodica vojnika protestuju na ulicama glavnog grada Bamaka, a kažu da vojnici nisu bili adekvatno zaštićeni iako u tom regionu ima dosta džihadista.
text:
At least 54 people have been killed in a jihadist attack in Mali

02 Nov 2019, 11:15

At least 54 people were killed in a jihadist attack on an army in northern Mali, the government said today.The attack happened yesterday when the army announced that 15 people had died in the Menaka region. This attack is expected to increase tensions in the region. Members of the soldiers' families are protesting in the streets of the capital city of Bamak, saying the soldiers were not adequately protected even though there are plenty of jihadists in the region.
